comments:
Build F1. I started with a fresh installation and after importing a project 
created a few launcher configurations using [context menu]->Duplicate. This 
and following attempts to run/debug the programs caused different internal 
exceptions (copied from the error log). Unfortunately I can't say what exactly 
lead to this behaviour. If you can't find the cause, add a short note to this 
bug; then I'll try to create a reproducible scenario.
